channel.title: Changing point amounts given for slayer tasks
channel.description:
Its for project insanity. Basically atm slayer gives pk points when you complete each slayer task (6 for easy, 10 med, 15 hard) but for certain tasks its gives double points by counting it as an easy and medium task. Im just wondering in what file would i fix this.
thanks
